item.description:
The Milford Black Bear Saloon has invited Karaoke Lovers to attend
Their Tuesday Night Karaoke.

When you get there, it is advisable that you wait to be seated by
Members of their staff.

The KJ is DJ Matt of Spectrum Entertainment.

They would love to host one of our group meetups and offer
drink/food specials. They host Karaoke night on Tuesdays from
9pm-close.

Is anyone interested?

It is in the Westfield Connecticut Post Mall.

It on the next floor above Borders and Target when
you go up the esculator by stores.
It is close to the Food Court.

The Milford Black Bear Saloon.

http://www.blackbearm...

www.blackbearmilford.com/index.php

The website does have music if you go to it.

We have been invited by Danielle Arrucci. She is the Events and Sales
Manager.

group.name: Karaoke Lovers of Greater New Haven .

item.name: Karaoke Lovers @ Milford Black Bear Saloon
